headline.main: Authorities Close to Revealing Details of Bourbon Theft
headline.print_headline: Authorities Close to Revealing Details of Bourbon Theft

docs.snippet: The mystery of who's been spiriting away barrels of Kentucky bourbon might soon have a resolution, as authorities seem close to revealing details about a possible theft ring....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mystery of who's been spiriting away barrels of Kentucky bourbon might soon have a resolution, as authorities seem close to revealing details about a possible theft ring.

headline.main: U.S. Urges Greece to Strike Deal With Creditors
headline.print_headline: U.S. Urges Greece to Strike Deal With Creditors

docs.snippet: The Obama administration on Friday urged Greece to move quickly with technical negotiations aimed at reaching agreement on bailout terms with the International Monetary Fund and European Union, saying a failure to strike a deal could hit the globa...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Friday urged Greece to move quickly with technical negotiations aimed at reaching agreement on bailout terms with the International Monetary Fund and European Union, saying a failure to strike a deal could hit the global economy.

headline.main: Injury Free Season Priority for Bolt
headline.print_headline: Injury Free Season Priority for Bolt

docs.snippet: Usain Bolt declared himself virtually unbeatable on Friday but downplayed expectations for 2015, saying his main priority was staying injury free ahead of next year's Rio de Janeiro Olympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt declared himself virtually unbeatable on Friday but downplayed expectations for 2015, saying his main priority was staying injury free ahead of next year's Rio de Janeiro Olympics.

headline.main: King of Swing Anderson Passes Botham's Record
headline.print_headline: King of Swing Anderson Passes Botham's Record

docs.snippet: James Anderson became England's highest wicket-taker in test cricket when he claimed his 384th victim in the drawn first test against West Indies in Antigua on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: James Anderson became England's highest wicket-taker in test cricket when he claimed his 384th victim in the drawn first test against West Indies in Antigua on Friday.

headline.main: Ex-Detective: Man Convicted in Murder Had Crush on Victim
headline.print_headline: Ex-Detective: Man Convicted in Murder Had Crush on Victim

docs.snippet: One of four ex-sailors who claim they falsely confessed to a 1997 rape and murder quickly became the prime suspect when police learned that he was romantically obsessed with the victim, a former Norfolk detective said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of four ex-sailors who claim they falsely confessed to a 1997 rape and murder quickly became the prime suspect when police learned that he was romantically obsessed with the victim, a former Norfolk detective said Friday.

headline.main: After 53-Year Run, Univision to End 'Sabado Gigante'
headline.print_headline: After 53-Year Run, Univision to End 'Sabado Gigante'

docs.snippet: Univision Network will have a giant hole in its Saturday night line-up - "Sabado Gigante," its top-rated variety show, will be going off the air after a record-breaking 53 years, the broadcaster said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Univision Network will have a giant hole in its Saturday night line-up - "Sabado Gigante," its top-rated variety show, will be going off the air after a record-breaking 53 years, the broadcaster said on Friday.

headline.main: Stopping Short of Rejection, Clinton Sets Conditions for a Trade Deal

docs.snippet: After 24 hours of silence, Hillary Rodham Clinton weighed in on perhaps the most divisive issue before the Democratic Party, setting her conditions for accepting a new trade deal making its way to Congress but not flat out rejecting it....
docs.abstract: After 24 hours of silence, Hillary Rodham Clinton weighed in on perhaps the most divisive issue before the Democratic Party, setting her conditions for accepting a new trade deal making its way to Congress but not flat out rejecting it.
